meanings.definition: A large predatory fish found in cold waters.
meanings.sent1: Wolffishes swim swiftly in the icy ocean.
meanings.sent2: The wolffishes hunt for food in the chilly sea.
meanings.sent3: The wolffishes had a race to see who could catch the most fish.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, the wolffishes are the kings of the hunt.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the wolffishes glistened under the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: Many wolffishes were spotted near the shipwreck.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught several wolffishes in their nets.
meanings.sent3: The wolffishes threw a party to celebrate their reunion.
meanings.sent4: The school of wolffishes moved together like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The wolffishes' shadows danced on the ocean floor as they swam.
